com.jrefinery.chart
Class StackedVerticalBarRenderer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.jrefinery.chart.VerticalBarRenderer
        |
        +--com.jrefinery.chart.StackedVerticalBarRenderer
public class StackedVerticalBarRenderer
extends VerticalBarRenderer

A bar renderer that draws stacked bars for a vertical bar plot.

Still experimental at this stage. The main problem is that setting an auto range for the axis is now a more difficult problem...so use a fixed axis range for now.

          Constructs a new renderer.

Method Detail

barWidthsPerCategory

public int barWidthsPerCategory(com.jrefinery.chart.CategoryDataset data)
Returns the number of "bar widths" per category.

There is just one bar-width per category for this renderer, since all the bars are stacked on top of one another.

Overrides:
barWidthsPerCategory in class VerticalBarRenderer
Parameters:
data - The dataset (ignored).

hasItemGaps

public boolean hasItemGaps()
Returns true if there are gaps between the items, and false otherwise.

In this case, there are no gaps between items, since all the items are stacked on top of one another.

Overrides:
hasItemGaps in class VerticalBarRenderer
Returns:
True if there are gaps between the items, and false otherwise.
